preference.name: CheckoutOnCreatePref
preference.preference_description: Determines whether the system checks out item revisions automatically upon creation. Sequences are subrevisions of an item revision that document the content of a revision during its evolution. Checking out an item revision increments the sequence ID. Valid Values: 0 - The system does not check out item revisions automatically upon creation. 1 - The system automatically checks out item revisions upon creation.
